I m a fan of David O Russell :. Three Kings is in my top 10 of all time. The Fighter is okay. Silver Linings Playbook is really good. American Hustle is overrated. Joy is similar to The Fighter in that it tells a story of a person whose career business is closely tied to his her dysfunctional family Both are based on real people. Joy is based on the life of Joy Mangano an American inventor and businesswoman and tells 2 stories one is about Joy s family and the other is about her business venture. The business story was fascinating. The family story was boring. The Fighter did a much better job telling the family side of the story and the reason was probably because of the better script and much better cast : Christian Bale and Melissa Leo were much better than De Niro and Isabella Rossellini. If you like biographical movies and you like Jennifer Lawrence then you might enjoy Joy.
